review: Well I had a very bad initial experience because it could not hold a internet connection. My router is in my office and the stick kept loosing connection. I mean constantly. I Do want to note that Crome cast and my smart tv have had to problem connecting and streaming. Also when connecting it said my connection was "very good", obviously not. Read a few other reviews and saw similar issues. So... ***NOTE*** only get this if your router is in the same room as your tv*****I ended up buying a wifi extender and now it seems to be working but still not quite as seamless as other devices. I got this so I can try out sling and so far it is working pretty good streaming live TV. If I could go back would probably go Roku stick to avoid having to buy a wifi extender.
